com.drgarbage.bytecode

Interface CountedOutput

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.DataOutput
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ByteCodeOutputStream

    public interface CountedOutput
extends java.io.DataOutput
    DataOutput plus a getter method for retrieving the number of bytes that have been retrieved so far.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getByteCount()
      Returns the number of bytes that have been written so far.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.DataOutput

        write, write, write, writeBoolean, writeByte, writeBytes, writeChar, writeChars, writeDouble, writeFloat, writeInt, writeLong, writeShort, writeUTF
